data.sql: select f1.CostCenter AS Cost_Center, f1.Hours AS Total_Chargable_Hours, f2.Hours AS Headcount, (f2.Hours * target_hours) AS Target_Hours, (f1.Hours / (f2.Hours * target_hours)) AS UR from (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from Finance GROUP BY CostCenter) AND Item="Total Chargeable hours (All resources)" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f1 inner join (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from Finance GROUP BY CostCenter) AND Item="Average Headcount" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f2 on f2.CostCenter = f1.CostCenter where f2.Hours > 0 and f2.CostCenter not like '100%' order by UR DESC limit 10;
